mapper.select: SELECT A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_CONTENT , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_WRITER , A.BOARD_COUNT , (SELECT ORG_FILE_NAME FROM TEST.MP_FILE WHERE BOARD_NO = A.BOARD_NO) AS ORG_FILE_NAME FROM TEST.BOARD_TB A ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEST.BOARD_TB VALUES( SEQ_BOARD.NEXTVAL, #{ boardContent }, #{ boardTitle }, #{ boardWriter }, #{ boardCount }, DEFAULT )

INSERT INTO MP_FILE( FILE_NO, BOARD_NO, ORG_FILE_NAME, STORED_FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE )VALUES( SEQ_MP_FILE_NO.NEXTVAL, (SELECT max(BOARD_NO) keep(dense_rank first order by BOARD_NO desc) as BNO FROM TEST.BOARD_TB), #{ORG_FILE_NAME}, #{STORED_FILE_NAME}, #{FILE_SIZE} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.FILE_NO, A.BOARD_NO, A.ORG_FILE_NAME, A.STORED_FILE_NAME, A.REGDATE, A.DEL_GB, ROUND(FILE_SIZE/1024,1) AS FILE_SIZE FROM TEST.MP_FILE A WHERE BOARD_NO = A.BOARD_NO AND A.BOARD_NO = #{ boardNo }

SELECT A.FILE_NO, A.BOARD_NO, A.ORG_FILE_NAME, A.STORED_FILE_NAME, A.REGDATE, A.DEL_GB, ROUND(FILE_SIZE/1024,1) AS FILE_SIZE FROM TEST.MP_FILE A WHERE BOARD_NO = A.BOARD_NO AND A.BOARD_NO = #{ boardNo }
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD_TB SET BOARD_COUNT = BOARD_COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = #{ boardNo }
